keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The decision by a judge to dismiss charges that included kidnapping, murder and drug trafficking against two men has drawn criticism from human rights groups, the United Nations and the United States.

headline.print_headline: Haiti: Government to Appeal Decision in Kidnapping Case
headline.main: Haiti: Government to Appeal Decision in Kidnapping Case
